mainText: Our heartfelt condolences to the Family and friends of Steve Jobs on his passing today!  He was a great inventor, technology guru, scholar, family man, humanitarian, and American icon!  He will truly be missed by the millions of people who knew about his products he created.  God Bless his soul and let us all remember the many lessons and goodwill he taught all of us! I for one will always cherish his ingenuity and dedication to his company.
author: Jerry
